title: Is Bobo a rip-off of another font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018061331im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bobo_6379.png)

Does anyone know if this Bobo is a rip-off of another font? You know, like Dawn Castle/Dom Casual. I'm sure I've seen it elsewhere under some other name, but I can't remember what it was.

Thanks in advance.
author: Stephen Lording

comments.content:
You may be thinking of [ITC Ziggy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018061331/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/ziggy-itc/), which is similar.

- Mike Yanega

Wow, thanks Rainer. So, it seems like it is a legit design. Well, there you go. Thanks for the Ziggy link, Mike, but I don't think that's the one I was thinking of. That little curly foot on the cap A looks so familiar. You know when one character just jumps out? I just can't link the context.

Anyway, thanks again for your help.
